gamepad_button_check_pressed: This function will return true or false depending on whether the given gamepad button is detected as having been pressed or not. Note that this function will only trigger once for the button the first time it is pressed. For it to trigger again the button must first be released and then re-pressed. If you need to check a continuous press of the button you should be using the function gamepad_button_check().

If you are checking an analogue button, then the check will take into consideration the threshold setting and only return true when the raw input value goes over the given threshold (you can get this raw value using the function gamepad_button_value()).
